synopsis.text: Chrishunds, a cyborg vampire known as Charley, finds himself in a peculiar alliance with his creator, the alluring vampire Johnny Rayflo. Serving as a hunter for the Vatican, Charley wages war against his own kind, refusing to succumb to the sin of consuming human blood. Instead, he quenches his thirst from Johnny, leading to a tumultuous relationship filled with conflict and unexplored attraction. As they navigate through a world of crime, humor, and sacrilege, they stumble upon a mysterious entity known as Vassalord. Will they unravel the truth behind this enigma before more blood is shed, or will their own desires consume them first? Join this unlikely duo as they face off against formidable foes, including a childlike vampire princess and a secretive branch of the Unitarian Church, all while grappling with their own complex bond.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
